import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.css'] }) export class MenuComponent { topNoticias: any[] = []; dataAtual = new Date(); slideConfig = { "slidesToShow": 1, "slidesToScroll": 1, "infinite": true, "autoplay": true }; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { this.getLabelsTopNoticias(); } getLabelsTopNoticias() { this.http .get( 'https://localhost:7265/Noticia/BuscarLabelsTopNoticias', ).subscribe((resp) => { this.topNoticias = resp as []; }); } }
